name: Tropical Holiday
description:
Fun, fabulous pineapple earrings!

These solid sterling silver earrings are handmade by Christina Lowry and feature polished leaves and a textured finish to the fruit. Each pineapple is approx. 5mm wide x 10mm high and come gift wrapped in a white jewellery box. Express posted within Australia. International delivery available at checkout.

In stock and ready for delivery.

name: One Crowded Hour
description:
These earrings are something special indeed. Their classic style and gentle movement will draw attention to your delightful smile, whether on a lunch date, celebrating at a wedding, or letting your hair down on a night out. The floral motifs complement each other, while adding a unique touch.

Handmade by Christina Lowry from sterling and fine silver, these beautiful drop earrings feature a pair of cabochon cut Carnelian, and a pair of Onyx drops. A different flower motif has been saw pierced by hand on the reverse of each stone setting. 

Earrings approx. 55mm in length and 14mm wide.

These earrings will come in a navy velvet draw string pouch, wrapped in vintage sewing tissue paper and tied with string. Express posted within Australia. International post available at checkout.

name: I Mustache You
description:
These fun Mustache earrings make the perfect gift for the difficult to buy for! Particularly perfect as a present from mustache wearing guys to mustache loving girls. Quirky and sweet, they can be worn every day for any occasion.

These solid sterling silver studs are made by Christina Lowry. The textured front is complemented by a smooth brush finished back, supporting secure posts and butterflies. Each stud is approx. 10mm wide x 5mm high and comes gift boxed and gift wrapped.

Express posted within Australia. International delivery available at checkout.

In stock and ready for delivery.

name: Starry Night
description:
Add a little star gazing to your day with this handmade sterling silver and onyx pendant. Hidden behind the beautiful banded onyx cabochon are a collection of stars, which add an extra dimension to this lovely, simple piece.

Hand made by Christina Lowry, this pendant comes gift boxed on a 45cm solid sterling silver chain and gift wrapped in vintage sewing pattern paper tied with string. This piece will be posted via Express post within Australia. International shipping available at checkout.

name: Satisfied Mind
description:
The greatest difficulty in being a jeweller is not being able to keep everything you make. This piece in particular I would love to add to my collection, as it ticks all the right boxes for me. These earrings are simple and beautiful, with added interest thanks to the alternating positions of the ovals, and the cut out pom pom flower motifs. 

Handmade by Christina Lowry from sterling silver, these unique drop earrings feature a pair of cabochon cut black Onyx or Iolite -  a dark blue / violet gemstone. A pom pom flower motif has been saw pierced by hand on the reverse of each stone setting. This design may be custom ordered in other colours. Please contact me to discuss gemstone possibilities.

Earrings approx. 26mm in length and 10mm wide.

Express posted within Australia. International post available at chekout.

name: Springdrop
description:
Elegant and feminine, the charms of this floral pendant make it a welcome addition for any special occasion. 

This sterling silver pendant was handmade by Christina Lowry and features a faceted pink tourmaline and a dyed drop fresh water pearl. The flower is created from a solid piece of sterling silver which has been filed and finished by hand. 

This piece will come packaged in a white jewellery box, on a solid sterling silver 45cm chain and will be posted via Express post within Australia. International shipping available at checkout.

name: Classic Hepburn
description:
A classic staple of any warbdrobe, these round, white, cultured pearls studs timelessly take you from day to night, season to season, year after year. Adding a little bit of specialness to your day.

White pearl studs are to your jewellery collection what your little black dress is to your closet. Think Hepburn, think Onassis, think cigarette pants and black flats, think patent clutches and over sized sunglasses. A pearl stud is the one piece you can rely on never dating.

A perfect gift for mothers day, for mothers of all ages.

A pair of 6mm round cultured pearl studs, these earrings are available with posts and butterflies in 9ct yellow gold for $95 (available for order), or sterling silver for $45 (in stock). Please make your selection at the checkout.

These earrings will be gift boxed in a white jewellery box and Express posted within Australia. International shipping available at checkout.

name: First Bloom
description:
This large white pearl is a centerpiece for any outfit. The natural beauty of the Australian pearl is enhanced by the delicate floral design, which adds a layer of whimsy, as it looks as if the pearl is a bud set to bloom.

This special piece is one of a kind. As I worked on it I envisioned this pearl being a gift to celebrate a special occasion; be it a milestone anniversary, a wedding, or the birth of a child.

'First Bloom' is a handmade sterling silver pearl pendant created by Christina Lowry. It features a beautiful 10mm round South Sea Pearl from Broome, Western Australia, which is set with a saw pierced polished flower shaped pearl cap.  

This piece will come packaged in a white jewellery box on a solid sterling silver 45cm chain, and posted via Express Post within Australia. International shipping also available.

name: Tea for Two
description:
Perfect for tea and coffee lovers alike, these little cups of goodness add quirky cuteness to your day! Whether you are running errands or escaping with a film, these sweet studs will be a delightful reminder to stop for a cuppa. Pair them with a 'One for the Pot' teapot brooch, or a set of colourful 'Afternoon Tea' beads, and you will be dressed and ready for wherever your day may lead you.

Available as studs or drops on a shepherd hook. These solid sterling silver earrings are made by Christina Lowry and feature a shiny brushed finish. Each cup is approx. 10mm wide x 5mm high and come gift wrapped in a white jewellery box. Express posted within Australia. International delivery available at checkout.

In stock and ready for delivery.

name: One for the pot Brooch or Pendant
description:
Nothing beats the first cup of tea of the day! Except perhaps a pot of tea, shared with a loved one. One teaspoon of loose leaf tea each, plus one for the pot. It's a lovely ritual to start the day and one that inspired the creation of this piece. 

Available as a brooch or pendant, this piece is made by Christina Lowry and features a solid sterling silver teapot with a wire brushed finish and is stamped 925. The piece measures 4.5cm x 3cm.

Six variations are available. Left to right - Tea bag, Gingko leaf, Plain, Daisy, Wattyl and Pomegranate. If your cut out of choice is not available please contact me and I will make it for you. Please allow two weeks. Custom cut out designs also possible.  

Packaged in a drawstring pouch and then gift wrapped, this piece will be bubble wrapped and Express Posted within Australia. International shipping also available at checkout.

name: 'Away with the clouds' Earrings
description: Whether you are planning a picnic with your one true love, or on your way to meet up with your oldest friend, these dreamy earrings will have you cloud gazing all the while. Your friends and loved ones will think you have a secret, as you loose yourself in the natural wonder of all things Cumulus and Nimbostratus. These sweet studs are as at home with a pair of jeans and a stripy shirt, as they are with a summer dress and a pair of Roman sandles. Team them with a few silver bangles tinkling on your arm to complete the look. These solid sterling silver studs are made by Christina Lowry. The polished front is complemented by a smooth brush finished back, supporting secure posts and butterflies. Each stud is approx. 10mm wide x 5mm high and comes gift boxed. Express posted within Australia. International delivery available at checkout. In stock and ready for delivery.

name: Yesterday, Today and Tomorrow
description:
The 'Yesterday, Today and Tomorrow' necklace is contemporary with a nod to a bygone era. A modern twist on a classic gem, the triple pearl necklace features a handmade solid sterling silver bar on which the pearls are threaded, and is attached to a fine, sterling silver trace cable chain.

Simple yet eye catching, the organic nature of the freshwater pearls contrast the horizontal structure provided by the bar. The pairing of pearls, straight lines and the texture of the chain creates the architectural feel of this piece.

This necklace speaks of chess games in dark coffee shops, walking old streets - camera in hand, and browsing in musty book stores. Worn with soft leather, washed linen, or cabled wool, this necklace will delight the wearer.

The sterling silver chain is 45cm in length. The freshwater pearls are 10-12mm in size. This piece comes packaged in a white jewellery box and is Express posted within Australia. International shipping is also available at checkout.

name: Silver Linings
description:
While all rain clouds may not have a silver lining, this one most certainly does. Sweet and lovely, this pendant is a darling reminder that grey skies are going to clear up.

This piece will surely attract compliments whenever it is worn. It's fun nature makes it the perfect piece for a girls night out. Team it with a party frock and let your personality shine! 

This sterling silver pendant was handmade by Christina Lowry and features a drop dyed Peacock freshwater pearl and cloud shaped motif. The cloud is created from a solid piece of sterling silver which has been cut, filed and finished by hand. 

This piece will come packaged in a jewellery pouch, on a solid sterling silver 45cm chain and will be posted via Express post within Australia. International shipping available at checkout.

name: Peaches and Cream
description:
This beautiful fresh water pearl necklace features a sterling silver filagree clasp. It has been traditionally, individually knotted on silk thread by Christina Lowry. This piece measures 41cm and comes packaged in a blue velvet draw string pouch.

In stock. Express Posted within Australia. International shipping also available at checkout.

name: Everyday Adventurer
description:
The soft curves and geometric lines of the 'Everyday Adventurer' Ring, make for a beautiful piece that is suitable for everyday wear. The unique design acts as a wonderful reminder to delight in the unexpected and become an adventurer of the everyday - from admiring the details around you, to trying something new more often.

This piece is at home being worn to the office or to a cafe. With it's straight edges it can be stacked with other rings, or worn independently. 

Entirely handmade by Christina Lowry, the ring features a 2.5 mm wide half round band, which supports a circle of gold or silver which has been domed by hand with punches. The dome is 8 mm wide. The ring is available in sterling silver, or a combination of silver and 9ct yellow gold. These rings are currently in stock in size 'M' and 'L'. 

To order a different size please select the custom listing and email me though the size you require. Most jewellers will check your finger size for you free of charge. Alternatively,  free ring size charts are available online which you simply print and lay a ring that fits you over the top.  

Rings come gift boxed and wrapped and are express posted within Australia. International shipping is also available at checkout.

name: Travelling Poet
description:
The 'Travelling Poet' Ring is a simple and beautiful piece for everyday wear. The hammered finish means that no matter how far you roam, or how rough you are on your jewellery, you will only add further character to this beauty. 

This solid sterling silver ring is handmade by Christina Lowry and features a textured hammer finish, which is unique to each ring. Inside the band is polished and stamped 925. The ring is 6mm wide and measures 1.4mm thick. 

Suitable for lads and lasses, this ring also makes a wonderful wedding ring. Matching sets available for order in silver or gold.  The ring pictured is in stock in a size K1/2 though the center. It is also available for order in your desired size and width. Please select 'special order' at checkout and email me the correct size - christina-lowry@hotmail.com (Most jewellery shops will check your ring size for you for free.)
 
Packaged in a white ring box and then gift wrapped, this piece will be Express Posted within Australia. International shipping is also available at checkout.

name: 'Rick Rack' Ring
description:
The delightful, wavy cotton goodness that is rick rack was the inspiration for this sweet ring. Making this the perfect gift for crafters who hand make happiness.

Suitable for everyday wear, the shiny 'Rick Rack' ring is smooth and practical. 


This solid sterling ring is made by Christina Lowry. The 4mm wide band is polished to a high shine and comes gift boxed. Please select size when ordering, or choose 'custom' and email me your size and allow two weeks for delivery. christina-lowry@hotmail.com 

Express posted within Australia. International shipping also available at checkout.

May also be ordered in 9ct or 18ct Gold.

name: Make a Wish
description:
Sweet and colourful necklaces featuring handmade sculpey beads and braided black cotton. They simply slip over your head for a splash of colour and handmade goodness. Perfect for popping out for afternoon tea!

Sculpey is a non toxic polymere clay that bakes hard. The necklace is approx. 70 cm (27 inches) in length and the black braided cotton is tied at the back. Each necklace is a little bit different.

Please select from the following, left to right -

1. 3 x white, 3 x blue, 3 x green
2. 6 x black
3. Black, pale purple, silver, medium purple, white with gold spots, yellow, dark purple, grey, purple and white marble

*Free National and International Shipping.*

name: The Sweetest Things
description:
Sweet and colourful necklaces featuring handmade sculpey beads and braided black cotton. They simply slip over your head for a splash of colour and handmade goodness. Perfect for popping out for afternoon tea!

Sculpey is a non toxic polymere clay that bakes hard. The necklace is approx. 70 cm (27 inches) in length and the black braided cotton is tied at the back. Each necklace is a little bit different.

Please choose from the following, left to right as pictured -

1. Purple and white marbled, purple, pale blue, white, dark purple
2. All black
3. Bright purple, white, peach, pale purple, brown

*Free National and International Shipping.*

name: Best wishes
description:
Sweet and colourful necklaces featuring handmade sculpey beads and braided black cotton. They simply slip over your head for a splash of colour and handmade goodness. Perfect for popping out for afternoon tea!

Sculpey is a non toxic polymere clay that bakes hard. The necklace is approx. 70 cm (27 inches) in length and the black braided cotton is tied at the back. Each necklace is a little bit different.

Please select from the following, left to right -

1. Hot pink, dark purple, silver & white marble, white with dots, bright purple
2. Pale purple, medium purple, pale yellow, dark blue, pale blue with white spots
3. Gold, black & tan marble, tan, black, choclate


*Free National and International Shipping.*

name: Beautiful Day Brooches
description:
Vibrant and beautiful, these sweet art clay brooches add a pop of colour to any outfit! These little darlings also make sweet gifts and stocking stuffers.

Handmade by Christina Lowry, each brooch is a little bit different. Vintage doilies have been employed to create the delicate textures exhibited on a selection of the brooches, while yet other brooches feature text such as - knit, sew, maker, crafty. 

Custom orders also welcome. Choose a colour, a pattern or text of your liking and email me christina-lowry@hotmail.com

Gift wrapped in vintage brown sewing pattern paper and tied with baking twine.

name: Finders Keepers Earrings
description:
Fresh and fiesty, these drop earrings are a delight for your ears!

Handmade by Christina Lowry from sterling silver and art clay, each pair of earrings is a little bit different. Vintage doilies have been employed to create the unique, delicate textures.

Custom orders also welcome. Choose a colour from the matching 'Beautiful Day' Brooches and email me at christina-lowry@hotmail.com

Gift wrapped in vintage brown sewing pattern paper and tied with baking twine.

name: Design Your Own!
description:
Now you can design your own sweet and colourful necklace! Simply choose five handmade sculpey beads, decide on black or brown braided string, then shoot me and email with your instructions. These fun necklaces are perfect for popping out for afternoon tea! They simply slip over your head for a splash of colour and handmade goodness. 

Sculpey is a non toxic polymere clay that bakes hard. The necklace is approx. 70 cm (27 inches) in length and the black braided cotton is tied at the back. Each necklace is a little bit different.

*Free National and International Shipping.*


Choose five different colours, five of the same colour, or any mixture you please!

Colours -
white
black
pale pink
med pink
bright pink
apple green
khaki green
navy
pale blue
pale yellow
yellow
pale purple
aubergine
red
grey
pearl grey (silver)
pearl white
peach
tan
orange

name: Left Bank Portrait Artist
description:
Whether wielding a pastel to capture a portrait, or taking notes for a novel, these understated earrings will accompany you on any creative endeavor without a fuss. Their everyday appeal makes them the perfect go-to earrings for any outfit. Add some handmade chic where ever you go.

These solid sterling silver studs are handmade by Christina Lowry. They are available in two sizes and styles - 

The larger pair are 9.5mm in diameter and feature a textured hammer finish and are $35. 
The smaller pair are 8mm in diameter and are feature a textured finish and are $30.
Please make your selection at the checkout.

These earrings come gift boxed and express posted with Australia. International shipping also available at checkout.

name: Gift Voucher
description:
A gift with a choice! 

Gift Vouchers are now available in $25, $50 and $100 denominations. The Voucher can be redeemed on any item/s in stock in the Christina Lowry Designs Bigcartel shop. It can also be used for custom made pieces.

Once purchased, a voucher with a single use code will be emailed to the buyer within 24 hours. The code will act as a discount when redeemed at checkout. Leave a note with purchase if you wish for the voucher to be emailed directly to the giftee.

To purchase, select the appropriate Gift Voucher value at checkout.

To request a voucher of a different value, or if you have any questions, please email me - Christina-lowry@hotmail.com
